paragraph: Now, in the city, Mara, a internal-affairs records auditor, must steal the banned-history archive before a deadline. When the regime's surveillance dragnet and a double agent inside her unit forces Mara to commit, there is no turning back. After a brutal setback, Mara realizes the old belief was false and must now change tactics in line with the moral premise. Pressure escalates until only one final path remains, leaving no choice but to drive toward the endgame. In a final confrontation, Mara faces the opposition and wins, achieving the goal.
moral_premise: People succeed when they act with courage, and they fail when they protect themselves at the cost of justice.

After a brutal setback, Mara realizes the old belief was false and must now change tactics in line with the moral premise.
Pressure escalates until only one final path remains, leaving no choice but to drive toward the endgame.
In a final confrontation, Mara faces the opposition and wins, achieving the goal.
